jobAgents.title: Power Agent V2 Randao
jobAgents.desc:
Each time the job is executed, the next Keeper is automatically assigned using a random
       number sourced from the blockchain consensus or the Randao contract. If the assigned Keeper
       does not complete the job on time or when conditions are met, other Keepers can slash him.

jobAgents.title: Power Agent V2 VRF beta
jobAgents.algo_hint: After each job execution, a Keeper is randomly assigned using a random number from PowerPool VRF, the block hash, and the Agent contract balance. This process involves cycling through all active Keepers and checking if they fall within the job’s stake range. Note that additional gas costs may be incurred if the stake range is too small.
jobAgents.desc: Each time the job is executed, the next Keeper is automatically assigned using a random number sourced from the PowerPool VRF, the block hash, and the Agent contract balance. If the assigned Keeper fails to complete the job on time or under the required conditions, other Keepers have the ability to slash him.
